page.internal-name: Mavin Foods officially provides Spring Roll produc
page.navLabel: Mavin Foods officially provides Spring Roll produc
page.title_s: Mavin Foods officially provides Spring Roll produc
page.content_html:
From 10/2020, Mavin Foods Joint Venture Co., Ltd. officially provided to market Spring Roll product. The products are launched to the market on the occasion of new year to create opportunities for customers to have more choices when enjoying Tet holiday food.

The product is manufactured in a closed supply chain "From Farm to Table", ensuring international quality management standards such as HACCP and ISO 22000. Raw materials are also selected carefully, ensuring the criteria of freshness, deliciousness, safety, nutrition and traceability.

More information about the products of Spring Roll:

Gio Lua is a traditional dish that brings the beauty of traditional culinary culture of the Vietnamese people in Tet occasion. Instead of just using for 1-2 days (traditional handmade products), Mavin’s Gio Lua can be used within 40 days if it is kept cool at 0-4 degrees C, 90 days if it is frozen below -18 degrees Celsius while ensuring the traditional flavor of Gio Lua.

To diversify products, Mavin also develops more products such as Cha Lua, Gio Ga and Cha Ga. 

Smart housewives can fry, cook Mavin’s Gio Lua into traditional Vietnamese dishes to change the menu.
